Articles.Content: Hi, with the release of Total War: Attila, i was wondering if any one else here has it or any other TW games.

> 
> Hi, with the release of Total War: Attila, i was wondering if any one else here has it or any other TW games.

I will buy it, but having bought almost all the Total War series in the past I know that it's going to take a few patches before it can be considered finished.

Let's plays have just started appearing on youtube so, I'll content myself with that for the time being, it's not the kind of game where spoilers matter anyway.
